parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Add given objects to the unit's list of synchronized objects.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''synchronizeObjectsAdd''' objects

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> objects: [[Array]] - An array of objects

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> Nothing

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_acm = _groupLogic [[createUnit]] ["AmbientCombatManager", [[position]] [[player]],[],0,"NONE"];
_acm [[synchronizeObjectsAdd]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[player]]<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>]</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[synchronizeObjectsRemove]]
</value></part></template>
